channel.title: Imgur on ReFarmer.Net :: Developer Version
channel.description: Recent content in Imgur on ReFarmer.Net :: Developer Version

item.title: Embed Photo album from IMGUR
item.description: Mediterranean Food Forest, January 2018 So that’s how it shows up, when you just copy embed code from an Imgur album (kinda hard to find: look just below comment section on last image in the post, that row of social media sharing icons, under the … at far RH end of the line), and just paste the code directly into a Blogdown post. It doesn’t give you a gallery widget on your own site; just a view of the first image w/ caption, that is linked to the full album on Imgur.
